text.tspan: Translate:
This is the main layout, it gets a nice name
and will contain what is needed
specifically to a practice
A copy of the main area, for example the layout we have for written practice:
An area for additional stuff might be needed - here the hints could appear maybe?
1a
2a
General layout - this is applicable for all practices
it includes the image if it is there and offers an alternative layout if there is no image
One or two fancy icons could go here - maybe a questionmark/lightbulb to show a hint
and a sound button to play back the associated sound.
Both would be hidden unless the sound/hint actually exists
A cool hover light up effect would be awesome :p
I would probably be a good idea to only have a rect here and define the icons somewhere else.
Maybe this should be part of the big black rect (specific stuff)
1b
Not sure if needed - the basic layout with no image associated
This is where the different practices put their stuff - see 2
This is where the different practices put their stuff - see 2
Defined elements like TEXT PROMPT THAT IS SHOWN TO THE USER
Text input
This could probably again be shared between the different modes!?!
A copy of the main area, for example the layout we have for Multiple Choice:
An area for additional stuff might be needed - here the hints could appear maybe?
2b
Defined elements like TEXT PROMPT THAT IS SHOWN TO THE USER
This could probably again be shared between the different modes!?!
Choices AREA
Maybe that's overdoing it - but it would be cool to offer the user to display 3-7 choices
A choice
This would be used for three choices - the invisible rects that define
the background are needed to watch where the user clicks!
Also we need shortcuts - but we have that working.
Lee - How about a cool hover effect? *bling*
A choice
We need to fill the same space for FOUR choices - compress them?
3a
3b
A choice
A choice
A choice
3 is really the minimum - if you think more than 5 are bad, don't do it
Can we compress it or move it to the right?
Because for multiple c we need vertical space I guess
A copy of the main area, for example the layout we have for Conjugations:
An area for additional stuff might be needed - here the hints could appear maybe?
2c
This could probably again be shared between the different modes!?!
Can we compress it or move it to the right?
Because for multiple c we need vertical space I guess
Conjugations suck. Always. I bet this time too.
I don't like to learn them, they are numerous - bah :(
Translate:
Text input
This is probably not the case here - conjugations are just that ... no hints avaiable?
But maybe the "this is a regular verb would be an idea?"
Translation:
to be
sein
The user enters it!
might be a good idea to evaluate before filling in the conjugated verb...
so the right word is conjugated at least.
HELL (also 4)
Tense:
Past future perfect
Too many inputs and stuff
This could theoretically have a size of singular/dual/plural * person(3) * gender(3) which would be 27 fields
Ideas appreciated
I'll go on with german to be
ich
du
er/sie/es
wir
ihr
sie
bin
bist
Lucky us - only 6 forms per verb
Next to this we can show general status stuff like leitner boxes etc
